participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Lucas finds joy in art and poetry while maintaining a competitive spirit from his sports background.
participant_1.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and practical, Megan values hard work and has a strong connection to her rural lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i drive a big truck and live in country. i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i work my parents farms.
